com.craftfire.commons.yaml
Class YamlCombiner

java.lang.Object
  com.craftfire.commons.yaml.YamlCombiner
All Implemented Interfaces:
YamlManager
public class YamlCombiner
extends Object
implements YamlManager

A YamlManager that combines multiple YamlManagers into one.

It allows to load yaml nodes from multiple files and treat them as one document, and then save them back to the files they came from.

Method Detail

getYamlManagers

public Set<YamlManager> getYamlManagers()
Returns set of all YamlManagers used by the combiner.

Returns:
set of YamlManagers

setYamlManagers

public void setYamlManagers(Collection<YamlManager> managers)
Sets the set of YamlManagers to use.

If managers is null, sets the set of YamlManagers to an empty set.

Sets the first YamlManager returned by iterator of managers as the default manager, or null if managers is empty.

Parameters:
managers - collection of YamlManagers

addYamlManager

public void addYamlManager(YamlManager manager)
Adds a YamlManager to this combiner.

If the default YamlManager is null, sets it to given manager.

Parameters:
manager - the YamlManager to add
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the manager is null

getDefaultManager

public YamlManager getDefaultManager()
Returns the default YamlManager of this combiner.

All new nodes that don't match elsewhere will be added to the default YamlManager.

If the default manager is not set, this method will set it to the first one in the set. If the set is empty, will return null.

Returns:
the default YamlManager or null

setDefaultManager

public void setDefaultManager(YamlManager manager)
Sets the default YamlManager of this combiner.

All new nodes that don't match elsewhere will be added to the default YamlManager.

The given YamlManager must be already added to the set of managers to use.

Parameters:
manager - the YamlManager to set as default
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the manager is not in the set
See Also:
addYamlManager(YamlManager)

setNode

public void setNode(String node,
                    Object value)
             throws YamlException
Sets node with the given path to given value.

If the node doesn't exist, the method tries to add it to the YamlManager with most matching node. If the node doesn't match anywhere, then it's added to the default YamlManager of the combiner.

Specified by:
setNode in interface YamlManager
Parameters:
node - the node path
value - the value to set
Throws:
YamlException - if one of path elements is a scalar node
See Also:
setDefaultManager(YamlManager), getDefaultManager()

save

public boolean save()
Description copied from interface: YamlManager
Saves the manager's document to the file it was loaded from.

Fails if the document wasn't loaded from a file or IOException occurred.

Specified by:
save in interface YamlManager
Returns:
true saved successfully at least one YamlManager, false otherwise

load

public boolean load()
Description copied from interface: YamlManager
Loads the manager's document.

Fails if trying to load the document from a stream or a reader more than once, or IOException occurred.

Specified by:
load in interface YamlManager
Returns:
true if at least one YamlManager loaded it's document successfully, false otherwise

load

public void load(File file)
          throws IOException
Creates a new SimpleYamlManager with the given file and adds it to the set.

Uses the default settings of the combiner to create the manager.

Parameters:
file - the yaml file to load
Throws:
IOException - if an IOException occurred
See Also:
addYamlManager(YamlManager), setDefaultSettings(Settings), SimpleYamlManager.SimpleYamlManager(File, Settings)

load

public void load(String path)
          throws IOException
Creates a new SimpleYamlManager with the given classpath resource and adds it to the set.

Uses the default settings of the combiner to create the manager.

Parameters:
path - path to the resource in classpath to load the yaml from
Throws:
IOException - if an IOException occurred
